metadata.title: CVE-2022-0741 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper input validation in all versions of GitLab CE/EE using sendmail tosend emails allowed an attacker to steal environment variables viaspecially crafted email addresses.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
